knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

Подключение библиотек
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(profvis)
library(magrittr)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
profvis({

  1:100000 %>%
    map(function(x) rnorm(10, x))
  
  map(1:100000, function(x) rnorm(10, x))
  
  for (i in 1:100000)
    rnorm(10, i)
})
```
